cause.description:
No matter where they are fighting, we will always support our troops. Even if you do not support the political reasons for the conflict, you should always support the troops.
Nobody gets left behind!!
1. Supporting our troops morally and/or physically.
2. Raise awarness that U.S. servicemen and women put their lives on the line every day to protect our nation.
cause.mission: support all U.S. servicemen and women serving on the frontline.
cause.name: Support Our Troops All Over the World
